companies.name: Abnormal AI
companies.reason: Rebranded to Abnormal AI with focus on AI-driven security solutions and launched breakthrough AI Agents. Recent funding round indicates growth potential.

companies.name: Arctic Wolf Networks
companies.reason: Expanded Aurora platform with new self-service security insights and MSP partner program. 2025 Trends Report highlights AI as a top cybersecurity concern. Doubled security operations warranty.

companies.name: Cloudflare
companies.reason: Implemented default blocking of AI web crawlers and introduced 'Pay Per Crawl' marketplace, changing how AI companies access and use website data.
